programme.title: The Breakfast Club with Gerald Koh & Sophie Gollifer
programme.desc: It's time to supercharge your morning with The Breakfast Club with Gerald Koh and Sophie Gollifer every weekday morning from 6am to 10am! And, everyone’s favourite local celebrity, Pierre Png, joins them every Tuesday from 8am to 10am!  Tune in to GOLD 905 and enjoy your morning commute with your favourite music, interactive contests and topics that matter to you!

programme.title: Lunchtime Jukebox with Denise Tan
programme.desc: Ask for a song and eat to the beat as I play your requests, tempt you with yummy food recommendations and tantalize you with interesting daily trivia from 10am-2pm.

programme.title: Number One Hits
programme.desc: Your favourite #1 Hits from 2pm to 4pm for the perfect afternoon soundtrack!

programme.title: The Homestretch
programme.desc: You’ve put in the work today, now it’s time for that evening dip on The Homestretch. Come on in, the temperature’s just right!  From 4 to 8 pm, it’s a feel-good mix of timeless hits, all the music you grew up with and keeping things fresh with today’s top topics and the stuff that matters.  Get in on the topic of the day - he loves hearing from you, whether it’s through texts or calls. Share your favorite memories from the ’70s, ’80s, and ’90s. From classic tunes and bold fashion to local bites and old hangouts.  The Homestretch is the best way to unwind and enjoy your evening drive home.

programme.title: Nite Flite with Mr X
programme.desc: Rest and relaxation are the shows KPIs. Your captain Mr X pilots the four hour nightly journey with stops for all the day's news, a regular health check, your nightly diet of food stories, odd behavior, and a blast from musical past when he uncovers a buried treasure from the GOLDMINE. All the night you need on GOLD 905's flying themed day-ender!

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: Rocking your Saturdays with two hours of the best and biggest Rock Hits from the charts with Mr X!

programme.title: Solid Gold
programme.desc:
Join resident DJ, DJ Boy as he spins retro hits for you to party and enjoy your Saturday evening!

DJ Boy is no stranger to the local club scene. You may recognize him on his DJ appearances at the top clubs in this region. From a humble start of spinning Retro and Top 40 club hits in the Singapore Club scene, to headlining humongous events, DJ Boy has become synonymous with every major dance music scene and movement in Singapore.

programme.title: The Vintage Showcase
programme.desc:
Some of the new features will include Brian's TOP 20 and Singapore Trivia with listeners' interaction. It will also encompass capsules likes SINGAPORE SNAPSHOTS, MOMENTS IN SINGAPORE HISTORY and REMINISING WITH. The latter will have special guests sharing a specific memory of their past.

There will also be a special request segment where a listener will share their memories which go with a special song.

programme.title: CNA News & Current Affairs Overnight
programme.desc: The latest from the CNA newsroom plus a showcase of the network’s award-winning current affairs programmes.

programme.title: Open for Business with Andrea Heng and Hairianto Diman
programme.desc: Kick-start your day with sharp insights, market updates, and the biggest business stories — all in one power-packed hour. Whether you’re making deals or making moves, Open For Business brings you news you can bank on and gets you ahead before the day even begins.

programme.title: The Morning Report with Andrea Heng and Hairianto Diman
programme.desc: Stay in the know while on the move with The Morning Report, your essential briefing on the day’s biggest headlines. We cut through the noise with deep-dive discussions, expert insights, and fresh perspectives on stories that shape your world — plus lively conversations on sports, entertainment, and everything in between

programme.title: Mind Your Money with Cheryl Goh
programme.desc: Make it your business to learn how the right moves can pay off in your work, career and personal finance journeys. Whether it is tips on acing job interviews, positioning yourself for a promotion, or smarter investing through passive income, Mind Your Money will speak to experts to help you get ahead in your professional life.

programme.title: Eat Drink Singapore with Cheryl Goh
programme.desc: Refuel and power up over lunch as we dish out the best food and drinks spots in Singapore. From humble home-bakers to Michellin-starred chefs, hear from the hands that make our food and keep our bellies happy.

programme.title: The Wellness Hour with Cheryl Goh
programme.desc: Get your mind off work during your lunch break as we take you on a journey to better your mental and physical wellness. We'll look at the many ways you can take a break from the stresses of life and explore the latest trends in wellness - from pawrenting to exercise, retail therapy to what's hot among the young and young at heart.

programme.title: CNA938 Rewind
programme.desc: The best interviews from CNA938 on current affairs, business, money, health, wellness, and lifestyle, curated daily.

programme.title: Made in SG with Melanie Oliveiro
programme.desc: Did you know that the thumb drive was invented in Singapore? Or that fish-head curry was created in a Singapore kitchen way back in 1949? Tune in to ‘Made in SG’ with Melanie Oliveiro and find out what other inventions, services, F&B delights and indeed innovators were born in The Lion City and how they became success stories. No cap, all fact!

programme.title: Culture Club with Melanie Oliveiro
programme.desc: ‘Culture Club’ shines the spotlight on the arts, theatre, music and books as Melanie Oliveiro speaks with creatives who have a passion – and penchant - for dreaming up soul-stirring stuff. Whether it’s a rapper who’s just dropped his EP, a director detailing his/her latest movie, a playwright whose latest work piece creates a stir, or an author eager to talk about their latest novel: Culture Club is one to join - on air and online.

programme.title: Destination Anywhere Melanie Oliveiro
programme.desc: Let Melanie Oliveiro take you on a continent-crossing trip around the world and/or get whisked away to exotic lands thanks to Destination Anywhere. Find out where in Singapore you can go to check out the latest historical trails, culturally-rich venues , events and even VR getaways.

programme.title: Singapore Today with Daniel Martin
programme.desc: At the end of a work day, Daniel Martin helps you take stock of the day's news. Get insights from those in the know and hear what newsmakers have to say.

programme.title: Health and Wealth Daniel Martin
programme.desc: Join Daniel Martin, as he brings you the latest health and market insights.

programme.title: A Letter To Myself with Joel Chua
programme.desc: Be inspired by the person behind the personality on "A Letter to Myself", as newsmakers, thought leaders, and everyday people reveal the most valuable lessons they've learned through life.

programme.title: CNA938 Rewind
programme.desc: The best interviews from CNA938 on current affairs, business, money, health, wellness, and lifestyle, curated daily.

programme.title: CNA News & Current Affairs Overnight
programme.desc: The latest from the CNA newsroom plus a showcase of the network’s award-winning current affairs programmes.

programme.title: Sun 天 Sun 夜 (Sunday, Sun Yay!)
programme.desc:
周末结束前的夜晚，Kevin 小蔡陪你整理思绪，收拾心情。《Sun 天 Sun 夜》，犹如你的心境转换站，以阳光为你充电，迎接全新的一周!

Kevin 小蔡 is a radio producer and part-time presenter with YES 933. 
Kevin participated in Mediacorp's YES 933 Hey DJ! Competition, where he emerged 3rd placing for the NTU category. An extroverted introvert, Kevin enjoys travelling alone, running, eating gummies and all things Disney. Kevin currently hosts the Sunday radio programme, Sun天Sun夜, from 8pm – 10pm on YES 933. On Wednesdays, he also helms the segment “小蔡一碟” on the evening radio programme 双节坤佳.

programme.title: Yeah 夜不打烊
programme.desc: 越夜越精彩！除了泽亮和品隽，晚上11点还有宇容的加入，表达不同观点，尝试各种新鲜挑战！没有准时收听，别说你还年轻！
